ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Its coming is your Lord's affair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The extent of its knowledge goes to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Its knowledge rests with your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This matter is in the hands of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Towards your Lord only is its conclusion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: To your Lord it is limited.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: To your Lord is the goal of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Unto thy Lord is the final end of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Unto thy Lord belongeth (knowledge of) the term thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your Lord alone knows when it will come;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Unto thy Lord is the Knowledge of the limit fixed therefor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Its outcome is with your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With thy Lord in the Limit fixed therefor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: To your Lord belongs (the knowledge of) the term thereof?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Its final end is for your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To your Lord is its finality.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: To your Lord is its finality.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:44] With your Lord it belongs ultimately, ultimate knowledge of it [lies with Him]; none other than Him has any   knowledge of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Unto thy Lord belongeth (knowledge of) the term thereof) the knowledge of its timing belongs to Allah.
